DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine placental drainage shortens third period labor reduces postpartum blood lose .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Placental Drainage Third Stage Labor : Randomized Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The study aim compare effectiveness placental drainage versus maintenance maternal cord clamp end third stage labor reduce postpartum blood loss .
